Description: Book of the Dead of Khonsiu; sheet 1; black outline vignettes; Hieratic text in red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Other parts of the same papyrus are BM EA 10322, Zagreb 886 and Vienna KHM 3856-8, 3862, 3864 and 3866-9. Being studied as part of PhD by Ulrike Weinmann (University of Wuerzburg).

Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (108)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (56958) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/56958)
